tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneratedText (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    generated_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES LanguageModels(id)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneratedTexts (
    text_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    generated_text TEXT,
    generated_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES LanguageModels(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserTextRatings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    text_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES GeneratedTexts(text_id)
);
